QuestData.Title: What the Soul Sees
QuestData.Description: For several centuries, the spirits of Auchindoun coalesced into my darkened essence. Many of the catastrophes that befell this crypt were a direct result of my weakened state.$B$BRegrettably, there is nothing that can be done to stop this cycle. It is a facet of the naaru condition - without the void, the Light cannot exist.$B$BYour only recourse is to destroy the ancient spirits of Nagrand before they transform into creatures of the void. Use the soul mirrors found throughout this crypt to free them...
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate a Soul Mirror somewhere in the Auchenai Crypts and use it to call forth a Darkened Spirit from Ancient Orc Ancestors in Nagrand. Destroy 15 Darkened Spirits so that the ancestors may rest in peace.$B$BReturn to Mother Kashur at the Ancestral Grounds when this task is complete.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Mother Kashur is visibly upset.>These naaru are wise beyond all manner of life on this world.
QuestData.RewardText: You have completed a long and dangerous journey, risking life and limb to ensure the safety of the Mag'har and the serenity of our ancestors. For this I am thankful beyond what words could convey.
